field.name: summary
field.comment: Brief summary of event. Text and html allowed. Displayed on Event Registration form and can be used on other CMS pages which need an event summary.

field.name: description
field.comment: Full description of event. Text and html allowed. Displayed on built-in Event Information screens.

field.name: event_type_id
field.comment: Event Type ID.Implicit FK to civicrm_option_value where option_group = event_type.

field.name: is_public
field.comment: Public events will be included in the iCal feeds. Access to private event information may be limited using ACLs.

field.name: start_date
field.comment: Date and time that event starts.

field.name: end_date
field.comment: Date and time that event ends. May be NULL if no defined end date/time

field.name: is_online_registration
field.comment: If true, include registration link on Event Info page.

field.name: registration_link_text
field.comment: Text for link to Event Registration form which is displayed on Event Information screen when is_online_registration is true.

field.name: max_participants
field.comment: Maximum number of registered participants to allow. After max is reached, a custom Event Full message is displayed. If NULL, allow unlimited number of participants.

field.name: event_full_text
field.comment: Message to display on Event Information page and INSTEAD OF Event Registration form if maximum participants are signed up. Can include email address/info about getting on a waiting list, etc. Text and html allowed.

field.name: is_monetary
field.comment: Is this a PAID event? If true, one or more fee amounts must be set and a Payment Processor must be configured for Online Event Registration.

field.name: contribution_type_id
field.comment: Contribution type assigned to paid event registrations for this event. Required if is_monetary is true.

field.name: is_map
field.comment: Include a map block on the Event Information page when geocode info is available and a mapping provider has been specified?

field.name: is_active
field.comment: Is this Event enabled or disabled/cancelled?
